title: Is Lata Mangeshkar better than Asha Bhosle? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both are good in their styles. Lata ji sung beautifully and some songs were only for asha ji because she gave a different cabaret and sex appeal.

Despite the rumoured differences of opinion with music directors and fellow artists; and despite Asha’s longivity, Lata had that magic in her voice ( till 1980s) which is mesmerising to listen and is better than Asha
